Carla Liesching (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye na-ese ihe ọcha si Johannesburg, South Africa, nke bi na New York City.
A mụrụ Carla Liesching na Cape Town n'afọ 1985 ma zụlite ya na obere obodo dị iche iche gburugburu SA, ọkachasị na Eastern Cape
Ọ natara BFA ya, ọkachamara na foto, vidiyo na ntinye ụda, na Mahadum Rhodes dị na Grahamstown wee kwaga Johannesburg ntakịrị oge ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2007.
Ọ nọrọla kamgbe oge na-arụ ọrụ na Taipei, Taiwan ma na-arụ ugbu a na New York City.
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha mmekọrịta mmadụ na nhazi, ọkachasị mgbanwe echiche na nhazi ala na akụkọ
Omume Liesching na-ekwu banyere echiche nke onwe n'ihe gbasara ebe, mmegharị, anya na nke

N'inwe mmasị na ụlọ ọrụ foto foto na ịkpụzi akụkọ njirimara, Liesching na-emepụta ihe ndekọ nke foto gburugburu ebe obibi, nke na-anụghachi azụ na ntinye aka izizi nke onye na-ahụ maka usoro nkewa mmadụ na nyocha pseudo-sayensị (dịka ọmụmaatụ, foto eji enyere aka na physiognomy, anthropology anụ ahụ, phrenology, Darwinism na colonialism.) Ihe Liesching na-etinye na-agụnyekarị ihe ọkpụkpụ na ụda n'akụkụ ọrụ foto ya.
Liesching na-anọchite anya ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri Brundyn & Gonsalves nke dị na Cape Town.

Usoro ya The Swimmers, na-egosi ndị mmadụ "na mba na ọdịbendị si n'akụkụ ụwa niile, na-eyi ihe ọ bụla ma e wezụga uwe ịsa ahụ ha. Naanị ihe ndị dị n'azụ ya abụghị osimiri, ma ọ bụ oké osimiri [...] Kama nke ahụ, Liesching na-etinye ndị ọ na-achị megide ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a gbahapụrụ agbahapụ, mmiri na-adịghị agagharị agagharị, ubi ọka na ala obodo siri ike

[...] n'ihi na ha etolitela n'ụwa nke gbanwere ngwa ngwa ma na-efunahụ isi ihe niile ya n'ụzọ [...Ọ bụ ụzọ isi gosipụta ọchịchọ ha ịbụ otu, mkpa ha nwere banyere njirimara, ógè ha na-ebi - gba ọtọ - n'ihu ụwa dum
